Package com.intellij.openapi.externalSystem.service

Interface RemoteExternalSystemService<S extends ExternalSystemExecutionSettings>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ExternalSystemTaskAware, java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RemoteExternalSystemProjectResolver<S>, RemoteExternalSystemTaskManager<S>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRemoteExternalSystemService, AbstractRemoteExternalSystemServiceWrapper, ExternalSystemProjectResolverWrapper, ExternalSystemTaskManagerWrapper, RemoteExternalSystemProjectResolverImpl, RemoteExternalSystemTaskManagerImpl

    public interface RemoteExternalSystemService<S extends ExternalSystemExecutionSettings>
extends java.rmi.Remote, ExternalSystemTaskAware
    Generic interface with common functionality for all remote services that work with external system.

    • Method Summary

      Allows to define notification callback to use within the current service

      Provides the service settings to use.
